items.name: Jungle Friends Puppet Parade
items.short_description: A whimsical outdoor puppet show featuring local wildlife characters, often seen strolling through popular Nosara areas. Interactive and engaging for all ages.
items.address: Various locations, often near Playa Guiones main entrance

items.name: Nosara Shadow Play Den
items.short_description: Step into a magical world of light and shadows, where kids can create their own stories using puppets and projections. Workshops available to craft unique characters.
items.address: Ruta 160, across from Super Nosara

items.name: Tico Tropical Circus Camp
items.short_description: A seasonal mini-circus camp offering aerial silks, juggling, and clowning for kids. Culminates in a charming, small-scale performance for families.
items.address: Near Bodhi Tree Yoga Resort, Guiones Norte

items.name: Nosara Folk Tale Puppet Show
items.short_description: Experience local folklore through beautifully crafted traditional puppets. Shows are held in an intimate outdoor setting, perfect for younger audiences.
items.address: Pura Vida Mini Golf, Playa Guiones

items.name: Guiones Reef Discovery Center
items.short_description: A small, educational center showcasing the vibrant marine life found in the Nosara reefs. Features local fish, corals, and interactive exhibits on ocean conservation.
items.address: Main Street, Playa Guiones

items.name: Nosara Mangrove Explorer Lab
items.short_description: Dedicated to the unique ecosystem of the Nosara mangroves, this lab has tanks with juvenile fish, crabs, and other creatures found in the estuary. Offers guided tours.
items.address: Near Nosara River mouth, Playa Pelada

items.name: Ostional Turtle Rescue Viewing Tanks
items.short_description: A small facility affiliated with the Ostional Wildlife Refuge, providing a temporary home for injured sea turtles. Visitors can observe turtles in rehabilitation tanks.
items.address: Road to Ostional, outside Nosara

items.name: Pacific Tide Pool Touch Exhibit
items.short_description: Interactive touch pools allow children to safely explore starfish, sea urchins, and other small marine creatures typically found in local tide pools. Educational staff on hand.
items.address: Near Playa Guiones North, next to the surf school

items.name: Nosara Mini Skate Bowl
items.short_description: A small but well-designed concrete skate bowl perfect for kids learning to skateboard or scooter. Offers beginner lessons and open sessions.
items.address: Behind 'Olas Verdes Hotel', Playa Guiones

items.name: Jungle Adventure Mini Golf
items.short_description: An 18-hole mini-golf course with a fun, jungle theme. Navigate through waterfalls, bridges, and local animal statues. Fun for the whole family.
items.address: Ruta 160, near Gilded Iguana

items.name: Nosara Little Ninja Kids Course
items.short_description: A scaled-down outdoor obstacle course designed for children to challenge their agility, strength, and balance. Supervision and safety equipment provided.
items.address: Behind 'Harmony Hotel', Guiones Beach

items.name: Nosara Beach Sports Zone
items.short_description: Dedicated public courts for kids' beach volleyball and soccer, located right on the sand. Often has informal games and pick-up matches for all skill levels.
items.address: Playa Guiones, near the main surf break

items.name: Jungle Canopy Coaster
items.short_description: A unique, gentle zip-line roller coaster hybrid that winds through the jungle canopy. Safe and thrilling for older kids and adventurous younger ones.
items.address: Road to Ostional, beyond the main Nosara strip

items.name: Nosara Mini Jungle Train
items.short_description: A charming miniature train ride that takes children on a scenic loop through a recreated jungle environment, spotting animal statues along the way.
items.address: Near 'La Banana' Restaurant, Guiones Norte

items.name: Nosara Splashdown Water Slide
items.short_description: A single, exhilarating water slide with a small splash pool, perfect for cooling off on a hot day. Simple fun for all ages, supervised for safety.
items.address: Behind the 'Super Express' market, Nosara Town

items.name: Sunset Beach Carousel
items.short_description: A charming, classic carousel with beautifully painted jungle animals, situated close to the beach for magical sunset rides. Operates seasonally.
items.address: Playa Pelada beachfront (seasonal location)

items.name: The Lost Pirate Treasure Quest
items.short_description: An interactive outdoor treasure hunt on Playa Guiones, where teams follow clues and solve puzzles to find the 'lost treasure'. Great for group play.
items.address: Playa Guiones, meeting point near lifeguard tower

items.name: Nosara Monkey Forest Puzzle Trail
items.short_description: A guided nature walk through a private reserve with challenges and riddles to solve, learning about the jungle and its inhabitants. Spot real monkeys!
items.address: Private reserve near Hotel Lagarta Lodge

items.name: The 'Surf Camp Secret' Escape Room
items.short_description: An indoor escape room themed around finding a legendary surf spot. Teams must solve puzzles and find clues within a limited time to 'escape' with the secret.
items.address: Plaza Guiones, above the surf shop

items.name: Bioluminescent Beach Night Quest
items.short_description: A magical evening adventure to discover the bioluminescent plankton near Nosara. Guides lead a gentle quest to learn about this natural phenomenon.
items.address: Meeting point at Playa Pelada parking (seasonal)

items.name: Nosara Treehouse Adventure Park
items.short_description: A multi-level playground built around natural trees, featuring swings, slides, climbing nets, and observation decks. Designed with sustainable materials.
items.address: Near the Nosara Yoga Institute, Guiones

items.name: Eco-Discovery Playground
items.short_description: An eco-friendly playground with wooden structures, a sandpit, and creative play zones encouraging connection with nature. Free access, community-maintained.
items.address: Community Center Park, Nosara Town

items.name: Surfside Splash & Play Park
items.short_description: A combination water splash pad and traditional playground, perfect for younger children to cool off and play. Shaded areas available for parents.
items.address: Near 'The Bodhi Tree', Guiones

items.name: Jungle Gym Explorer Zone
items.short_description: A challenging multi-structure jungle gym with bridges, tunnels, and a climbing wall designed for active kids to burn energy and develop motor skills.
items.address: Across from 'K'DOGZ' restaurant, Guiones

items.name: Nosara Wildlife Rescue & Education Center
items.short_description: A respected wildlife rescue center that rehabilitates injured animals. Offers limited public viewing of some non-releasable residents and educational talks.
items.address: Ruta 160, near the Nosara River bridge

items.name: Mini Finca Petting Zoo
items.short_description: A charming small farm where children can interact with friendly farm animals like goats, chickens, and miniature horses. Hand-feeding opportunities available.
items.address: Behind 'Super La Paloma', Nosara Town

items.name: Nosara Butterfly Garden & Aviary
items.short_description: Walk through an enclosed garden filled with a vibrant array of local butterflies and colorful tropical birds. Learn about their life cycles and habitats.
items.address: Next to 'Hotel Santa Teresa', Playa Pelada

items.name: Nosara Sloth Sanctuary Guided Walk
items.short_description: A unique opportunity for a guided walk through a protected area known for its resident sloths. Observe these gentle creatures in their natural habitat from a distance.
items.address: Road to San Juanillo (specific meeting point given)

items.name: Tropical Tumble Soft Play Zone
items.short_description: A multi-level indoor soft play area with slides, ball pits, and climbing structures, providing a safe and stimulating environment for young children to play.
items.address: Plaza Guiones, next to the bank

items.name: Nosara Kids' Art & Craft Lab
items.short_description: An indoor space dedicated to creative expression through various art mediums. Offers drop-in sessions for painting, clay, and craft projects, perfect for rainy days.
items.address: Ruta 160, across from 'Organico Market'

items.name: Jungle Games Arcade & Laser Tag
items.short_description: An indoor entertainment center with classic arcade games, redemption games, and a small laser tag arena. Fun for older children and teens.
items.address: Near 'La Pulperia', Guiones

items.name: Bounce House Fiesta
items.short_description: A spacious indoor facility filled with inflatable bounce houses, obstacle courses, and slides. Perfect for energetic kids to jump and play, especially on hot days.
items.address: Behind 'Nosara Pizza', Nosara Town

items.name: Nosara Eco-Discovery Museum
items.short_description: An interactive children's museum focused on the unique ecology of Nosara and Guanacaste. Exhibits cover marine life, jungle animals, and sustainable living.
items.address: Plaza Guiones, second floor

items.name: Tico Kids Culture & Art Studio
items.short_description: A hands-on museum where children explore Costa Rican culture through traditional crafts, music, dance, and storytelling. Offers workshops and open creative play.
items.address: Near 'La Bodega', Nosara Town

items.name: Little Surfers' Science & Wave Lab
items.short_description: This museum explores the science behind surfing and waves, marine biology, and ocean physics through interactive experiments and exhibits for aspiring young surfers.
items.address: Playa Guiones, above a surf school

items.name: Nosara Young Innovators' Workshop
items.short_description: A hands-on discovery center focused on STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Math) with build stations, coding games, and simple robotics for creative learning.
items.address: Ruta 160, near the gas station

items.name: Hacienda Guiones Farm Tour
items.short_description: A working family farm offering guided tours where children can learn about tropical fruit cultivation, coffee processing, and traditional farming methods. Includes tasting.
items.address: Hacienda Guiones, off Ruta 160 before Nosara

items.name: Rancho Pelada Horseback Riding
items.short_description: Enjoy guided horseback rides along the beach and jungle trails. Friendly horses and experienced guides make it safe and fun for children of all riding levels.
items.address: Playa Pelada, near the river mouth

items.name: Nosara Dairy & Cheese Making Experience
items.short_description: Visit a small local dairy farm to learn about cow milking and artisanal cheese making. Kids can try their hand at basic tasks and sample fresh products.
items.address: On the road to Garza, outside Nosara

items.name: Tropical Fruit Picking Adventure
items.short_description: A seasonal attraction allowing families to visit an orchard and pick their own fresh, organic tropical fruits like mangoes, starfruit, and papayas.
items.address: Orchard near Finca Austria, Nosara
